body:
Second Part: And what would have been even better is that the first daughter's mind and consciousness remains, I don't know if it fused but got dominated by MC's will because they didn't precise it in the story.
My Overall Rating : 9.8/10 Great read

First Part: You see this here, that's extremely good. I was going to stop and spit on it when Isby said his last death wish, but I'm happy I still had a little hope for a situation change, which happened. Because many doujins on this site betrayed humanity whether men or women and I won't call these trash and shit because I would be insulting garbage and excrements. And for the absolute better, that guy didn't care about Isby's death wish and I like that because otherwise it would be betrayal to humanity and siding with monsters. Also he got his power, heheehehhe and can shape-shift form that means that he can also get in a futa form where he would have a mix of his appearance, the two daughter's and his "gf" added to his appearance. What better ending would there be. Not forgetting that there's also the power steal which he obtained. Lastly, overall of the story : humanity won over monster; overall of humans internal affairs: MC won with an absolute and an unanimously victory.

Okay... uhh... I'm comfused? lol Maybe it's because of translation issues but I didn't quite get what happened or should I say, who is who anymore. Although I can tell it's kind of dark absorption story, not like that other manga of the slime who loves a guy and therefore absorbs every girl he finds attractive to have sex with him. I love that one. I don't think I'll keep up with this manga here.
Idk the story was too hard for me lmao
this is what i search for, and i like it
Also HolicXx you can suck my dick you got some shitty ass stories you must be checking out
Hands down some of the best possession/Transformation ive seen in a while, amazing fucking job by Marialite once again.

But it's mostly to pass the time and wonder what comes next! Don't get why people hate you for voicing your thoughts! That's why the comment section exists (and doesn't have a short Word Limit! Meaning I can do whatever the hell I want) But I guess people love wasting their time telling people to "stop wasting THEIR time" like they were being commented to! Or just to troll and start a comment war (who the fuck has time for that! At least my "Wall of Text" is fucking entertaining to look at for a few seconds before moving on!....And goes beyond "Kill Yourself Writer/Commenter I dislike/ETC" or being a NTR fan and calling everyone else Incel! Here's a Tip, if your hating someone for not accepting your fetish! Calling them something that applies to everyone here in a way INCLUDING YOURSELF is pretty self defeating! People seem to be "Suicide Bombers" with how their willing to hurt themselves just to mildly annoy their opposition). I'll waste my time on anything, but not on idiots & asses!

@Mephal Happy to have entertained! Again that was more or less Copy and Pasting the person who made the Theory, Theory off their comment on E-hentai! Plus those who want to nut and fap should not come down to the comment section! It's not you, I just had a PASD (Post Annoyance Syndrome) from idiots who complain about comments, yet make a point to comment which is pretty hypocritical of them(or on Manga sites that have Comment Sections where someone has to annoyance their dropping a manga/manhua like their someone important and you have to hear their Announcements....The age of narcissism is fucking REAL folks). Reminds me of Randy from South Park when he said not to point fingers, while pointing at everyone LOL!
Why the fuck ist there a facehugger
@LordCellofEarth9 I came here to fap and yet I ended up facinated by your theory thanks fam!
Took me a couple reads to understand. What a masterpiece!
trying to read this was harder than my pp.

I don't know what just happened but uhh...
GOOD!👍
Amazing!

It's why I had that "F for Facehugger!" Since if my theory is true (and even if it's not), his chance to save his friends and future was wasted on the WRONG PERSON! (And even then, he had to have read his mind and knew he was her BF, why would he murder her just cause he was asked with a sob story? There's no indication from what the two babes said that state the two separated as they had "orders" to protect him too! Though if my theory is sound, protecting the GF was a cover for protecting "their real target!" BF was given less focus because if he's "Lady Freya", he knows Facehugger would pop up and fuse Mind Control Babe and his past self! And he knows he'll mind control the Blonde by reflex! He just didn't want either "victims" to catch on that they were disposables who were only created to be his past self's Slaves and ticket to domination since it looked like even as creations they still had free will! And Mind Control Babe when made likely need her guard down for it all to work!)

@Kredshift I think they got that already my froggy friend! It's more "how does any of it make sense!" Hence the theory I put forward that "Lady Freya" of the future isn't the GF, but in reality the BF and this time travel shit is just him assuring a "stable" timeline! (Time travel is weird, but as I'm going with it! All this happened and he remembered it happening as he abused his power more and more, note he said he didn't need his GF anymore with his power, but he wasn't going to kill her like Facehugger wanted him to, not that it would do anything now, likely he used his brainwashing powers to control "Freya" till she became "the face" as he can shapeshift yes, but, and none of his GF suppose powers feel like they would create those two babes and their powers...unlike HIM if he gave his new powers time, hell meeting them likely INSPIRED their original creation! We're just seeing how he "became Lady Freya and took over the world!)

OK so this is how it goes:
- Black and Blonde ladies goes time travel to protect FMC.
- MC gets ambushed and fused with black haired lady, stealing the hypnosis ability.
- Alien has shape shifting abilities so basically it's just the 2 ladies doing each other in other bodies.
Confusing as hell

F for Facehugger if what I put down is true! It means he left his hopes and dreams of revenge to the VERY PERSON WHO WAS HIS REAL TARGET ALL ALONG (And even gave him apart of the power he would use to create the situation that cost him his friends AND put him in the situation of going back in time for revenge. He empowered the enemy all along! It's why time travel to "set what was made wrong" never really works out! Unless you know all the details, you're just asking to fuck everything up just by breathing air cells that were not meant to be breath by anyone in the area you teleported in). Even without said theory he empowered a likely worser monster then his enemy ever could be! Wish writer had a better script editor to help him, I agree with everyone this shit's "confusing", hope the next clarifies

You know, I was on E-hentai, and someone in the comments for this put up a theory that the BF was actually those two's "creator" and not the Super-heroine GF! That this is just "her" stabilizing the time loop by pushing the demons to the point Facehugger goes back in time to try and find a way to defeat the Heroine and never realized said Heroine was "never the ". I guess keeping his GF alive if this is true is more because BF needs to be guided in his hatred to become "her" in the future. And that only happened because GF refused to put out for him (I mean seriously, what was the point of "keeping HIM" safe if GF was more important from the tone of Blondie! Understandable to keep it a secret that she and her sister were created for the purpose of dying in the sister's case to get the power and being a mind slave for the Blond! No need for them to know that's their "mother's" intended fate for them LOL)
